articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot is given a two-game touchline ban following his red card against Everton this month.

articles.description: Didier Drogba defends former manager Jose Mourinho and insists the Portuguese is "not a racist" after Galatasaray accused the Fenerbahce manager of making "racist statements" following the 0-0 draw on Monday between the rivals.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Didier Drogba defends former manager and insists the Portuguese is "not a racist"

articles.title: England v Spain: Women's World Cup finalists meet at Wembley in Women's Nations League

articles.title: World Boxing: International Olympic Committee grants provisional recognition as international federation

articles.description: Key figures in Formula 1's governing body the FIA are barred from a meeting on Wednesday in a dispute with president Mohammed Ben Sulayem.
articles.title: Formula 1: Key figures barred from FIA meeting after refusing to sign NDA in dispute with Mohammed Ben Sulayem

articles.description: Marty Sheargold said that the Matildas players reminded him of "year 10 girls".
articles.title: Marty Sheargold: Australian host loses his job over women's football remarks

articles.description: Former Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says his generation had "much thicker skin" than current players.
articles.title: Man Utd: Erik ten Hag says modern players find criticism 'offensive'

articles.description: Luka Doncic's triple-double helps the Los Angeles Lakers to a 107-99 win over the team he left this month.
articles.title: LA Lakers 107-99 Dallas Mavericks: Luka Doncic records triple-double against former team
